ai-patthana16.10:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.10:1.1_0: I have not declared form: ‘This is a reason.’
ai-patthana16.10:1.1_1: Not answering in any such form, the unskillful is not skilled in form.
ai-patthana16.10:1.1_2: I haven’t declared form, or unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana16.10:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
